title: Character
description: An array of characters and their actions in the game

weight.description: A character's weight, influencing gravity and knockback factor.

speed.description: A character's speed, modefying the character's movement

hurtbox.description: The rectangular area where the character will take damage.

length.description: X-axis length of rectangular character hurtbox in pixels.

height.description: Y-axis height of rectangular character hurtbox in pixels.

actions.description: A list of all actions the character has and can be in, with items being action names.

actionName.description: A specific action object containing all information about an action.

hitBox.description: The area where the specific action can deal damage.

width.description: X-axis length of rectangular action hitbox in pixels.

height.description: Y-axis height of rectangular action hitbox in pixels.

offsetX.description: X value of center point of the action hitbox offset from character hurtbox.

offsetY.description: Y value of center point of the action hitbox offset from character hurtbox.

isTraversible.description: Tells whether other hitboxes/hurtboxes can pass through this hitbox.

isSelfInterruptible.description: Tells whether the player can interrupt this action with other inputs.

actionpPriority.description: Describes the priority of the action, what action it can interrupt/be interrupted by.

damage.description: The base damage this move will deal to other characters, not including modifiers.

knockback.description: Contains the x and y values of a vector describing both the velocity and acceleration knockback from the action, [vx, vy, ax, ay]

duration.description: The duration of the action in frames.

isProjectile.description: Tells whether the attack itself is a projectile. If yes, the above values will therefore count for the new projectile object created rather than be an extension of the character object.
